name: Add user features
description: Add avatar_url and last_login_at columns to users table
sql: ALTER TABLE users ADD COLUMN avatar_url VARCHAR(512) NULL COMMENT '用户头像URL' AFTER role
ALTER TABLE users ADD COLUMN last_login_at DATETIME NULL COMMENT '最后登录时间' AFTER updated_at
ALTER TABLE users ADD INDEX idx_last_login (last_login_at)
